text: Pyotr Ivanovich Pimashkov (; 2 July 1948 â€“ 12 August 2021) was a Russian politician. He was born in the Bykhaw District, then-Soviet Union. He was Mayor of Krasnoyarsk from 1996 until 2011. He was a member of the State Duma from 2011 until his death. Pimashkov was a member of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union and United Russia. Pimashkov died on 12 August 2021 in Sochi, Russia from cardiac arrest at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Mayors Category:People from Krasnoyarsk
title: Pyotr Pimashkov
